data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module is a subclass of HTML::TokeParser. It blesses the array
    references that are returned and allows programmers to munge HTML
    very easily. Tags can now be rewritten on the fly without needing to
    worry about the mechanics of it. It's also a drop in replacement, so
    using this module requires NO changes to the code, except for the
    bits you might want to enhance (and, of course, direct references to
    the package name).
